hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Stone of Agony# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #a Deku Stick# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Hookshot#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Recovery Heart#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #treasure chest game# grants #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that ##Goron City## has #5# major items.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #2# major items.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Skull Mask# yields #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found in #Goron City#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that shooting #the sun# grants #the Mirror Shield#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Purple Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 3 Top

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that deep in the #wasteland a spider and a chest# hold...^ #Ruto's Letter# and #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: This hint is in another castle.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: Hoot! Hoot! Would you like me to repeat that?

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path of #Skulls#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly GS Water Switch Room

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #the Song of Storms#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Hookshot#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##the Bottom of the Well## has #10# major items.

SFM (Saria).text: They say it's 106 miles to Hyrule Castle, we have half a bar of magic, it's dark, and we're wearing sunglasses.

ToT (Left).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #10# major items.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path of time.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Recovery Heart#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #a Fish Bottle#.
hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly GS Lobby Basement Upper

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #Light Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

ZR (Near Domain).text: For you, the day you read this hint was the most important day of your life.^But for me, it was Tuesday.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.
